data.comment: Today's referee, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo, has blown to start the match.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Puebla.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 5, Free kick Queretaro.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, In Puebla, Christian Tabo of Puebla is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Puebla close to the penalty box.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 12, In Puebla Puebla attack through Santiago Ormeno. The finish is off target, however.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 14, Queretaro pushes forward through Angel Sepulveda, whose finish on goal is saved.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 16, Christian Tabo for Puebla gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
Maximiliano Perg for Puebla drives towards goal at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the finish is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
In the minute 21, Queretaro are pushing forward but Angel Sepulveda's finish is wide of the goal.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Puebla a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 23, Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 26, Salvador Reyes of Puebla gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Queretaro throw-in in Puebla's half.
In the minute 27, Goal! Puebla have got their heads in front thanks to a Osvaldo Martinez strike.
Great play from Salvador Reyes to set up the goal.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Angel Sepulveda.
In the minute 29, Free kick Puebla.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla surge into the attack at Estadio Cuauhtemoc but Javier Salasâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 30, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Puebla.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Queretaro.
Javier Salas of Puebla smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Santiago Ormeno (Puebla) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 36, Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Puebla.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
Queretaro's Kevin Ramirez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Puebla a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Puebla throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Throw-in Queretaro.
Queretaro's Kevin Ramirez breaks free at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Puebla have a goal kick.
Puebla's Santiago Ormeno is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Sebastian Sosa.
Kevin Ramirez instrumental with a fine assist.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
The home team replace Salvador Reyes with Daniel Alvarez.
In the minute 46, Great finish from Omar Islas to give Queretaro a 1-3 lead.
Angel Sepulveda with an assist there.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 47, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to Queretaro's area.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Important block from the Queretaro defence as Santiago Ormeno fires in a strike for Puebla.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Queretaro.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 51, Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Queretaro's Kevin Ramirez has been booked in Puebla.
In the minute 53, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Puebla.
Free kick Puebla.
Fernando Madrigal (Queretaro) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 56, Puebla drive upfield and Christian Tabo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Queretaro defender.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
In the minute 57, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Queretaro drives forward and Fernando Madrigal gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Attention is being given to Pueblaâ€™s Maximiliano Perg and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 60, Maximiliano Perg, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Nestor Vicente Vidrio is the substitute for Puebla.
Amaury Escoto is on a sub for Santiago Ormeno for Puebla.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Free kick Puebla.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 65, Puebla push forward at Estadio Cuauhtemoc and Amaury Escoto gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Queretaro defence.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Puebla's Omar Fernandez breaks free at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 67, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Queretaro.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Goal! Puebla reduce the deficit to 2-3 through Brayan Angulo.
That's a fine assist from Omar Fernandez.
Puebla needs to be cautious. Queretaro have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 70, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 72, Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Queretaro make their first substitution with Kevin Escamilla replacing Sebastian Sosa.
In the minute 75, Bernardo Cuesta is replacing Omar Fernandez for the home team.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Throw-in Puebla.
In the minute 77, Throw-in high up the field for Queretaro in Puebla.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla's Brayan Angulo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Queretaro defender.
In the minute 82, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Puebla throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Queretaro's Angel Sepulveda misses with an attempt on goal.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Kevin Ramirez (Queretaro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pablo Gonzalez Diaz is on a sub for George Corral for Puebla.
The away team replace Omar Islas with Omar Arellano.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Queretaro are coming forward and Erik Vera gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 86, Puebla have a dangerous throw-in.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 89, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Can Queretaro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Puebla's half?
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-3.
Goal! Puebla go level at 3-3 through Christian Tabo in Puebla.
Julio Nava is replacing Angel Sepulveda for Queretaro at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
